name: Kayla previously La Lechonera
address: 747 New Lots Ave, Brooklyn, NY 11207, USA

reviews.text: Just stopped by for a bite, it turned out to be a  meal, delicious baked chicken yummy potatoe salad and red rice washed down with a glass of guanabana juice ohhhhh so satisfying looking forward to go back soonü§óüòã

Encontramos este sitio por casualidad, toda la comida es casera, riqu√≠sima. Venimos desde Barcelona y nos preocupaba no poder encontrar un sitio donde ofrezcan a lo que estamos acostumbrados, a lo casero!! El due√±o Jose e Inova, son un encanto, lo recomiendo al 100%, gracias!!!ü´∂üèº
I found this restaurant by accident, I'm so glad I did. The food is so delicious, you can't beat the prices. I'll be going there on a regular
Buen servicio

Guys so first of all I googled this place I went of your reviews thank you and it did its job it was delightful the rice nice and fluffy well done the beans smelled like grandma had just made them the baked chicken was good and a side of salad
I will not be eating here again, this place is overrated and the food not worth it. Doesn't  seem clean. I would not recommend

Horrible !!!

New Owners
I brought a family style dinner. Beef stew, White Rice, and Beans. No plantains no salad. The meal came up to $30.  I was appalled but the food was already dished  out so I'm like ok I'll just take it. I got home and shared the food between myself and my boyfriend. The food was EXTREMELY salty. And not flavorful. You know when a cook over salts the food to try to compensate for flavor. Yes, that. Not only was it expensive for Spanish food it didn't taste good. I'd never buy food from here again. I was better off going a few blocks down to where ATB cab station is and gotten food from the restaurant on that block. Never Again !!!

New Owners - They are NOT associated with  La Lechonera (The Old Owners)
This is a great place. Been eating here for years. I moved and still travel here For the food.
The food is great the only problem I having is getting in contact
Wow great taste! üëå customer service was great polite and professional make me feel welcome! Marian, Rosa n Pedro are awesome.
If you'd like the Mexican food, this is the place they cook pretty good. The service is great and The atmosphere is smooth.
Great Spanish food choice, food is fresh, the fried shrimp is great , love this please for many years , recommended

Their food is delicious! I'll definitely would love to make this a regular lunch spot or when I don't want to cook I 100 percent recommend üëå  I can't wait to try their other dishes! I'm pregnant I'm waking up in the middle of the night thinking about it üò©

The fried chicken with the yellow rice and beans was very good. Their fried chicken is Made well and has a nice taste also with crispy skin. It‚Äôs only five dollars for a portion of three pieces of chicken with yellow rice and beans.

This place right here... their fryed chicken is worth my bus ride to here... the food is grate.. I wish it was bigger  so the workers can move around better but its worth the effort  to get here.. another bus ride
The food there is very good an the employees are very respectful
Never disappointed when I eat here. Feels like family. Fried shrimp with rice n beans is my go to. I always get to meal out of it. Thats a great deal!!!!

We love the fried chicken.  This place is worth the ride.  Dont forget the pricing!

I go here almost every other day after school. The employees are always pleasant & welcoming. The food is fresh & they always give a good serving amount when sharing food. Maria is very personable & demonstrates excellent customer service. I would recommend them to anyone who‚Äôs willing to try!
White rice, tostones, shrimp with garlic sauce salad with Italian dressing and 2 classic Cokes in a can. Absolutely delicious.
The food is delicious.  The staff is good and prices are great.
Great food and great people
Food was a little dry.. But it was good. And clean.
Me ecanta el asopao de camarones que hacen.
A little latino flavor.
Good
Spanish authentic food. God bless those ladies in there. They grind hard everyday.
The staff is Always welcoming & courteous. Real food- very delicious.
Great, simple, delicious, courteous.

I went there to purchase food for my mechanic. He gave me money with grease on it unintentionally b/c he had been working on cars all day. I ordered my food and then paid. I had been given my change and was immediately called back as i was leaving. The owner of the establishment indicated that " I dont think A bank would take this" in front of customers. I was very embarrassed. He made it seem as if i gave him a fake bill. A woman worker tried to mediate by saying i could pay next time, but i went back and got another bill, which they still questioned b/c it had some grease on it, but not as much as the 1st one. They eventually took the money, but needless to say my experience there was uncomfortable. I have been a customer for for over 10 years and never experienced this. Needless to say i wont be back.
üëèüèª‚Ä¶

I love everything they serve nice big portions their fried chicken toddie for also they make these  spaghetti with shrimps that you can't get enough of,their pepper steak so soft it melts inyyour mouth.I go there at least 3to4 times a week really I hardly cook.I give them a double star's,they're the best.
The proverbial hole-in-the-wall spot, great food with an even better price! As someone else mentioned the pork and rice on Saturday is "da bomb". Enough said.
They have the best food ever! My special foods are shrimp spaghetti & fried chicken!  You can always trust the greasy spoon!
Big platter for $7 enough for 2 people to share or 2 separate meals. Different food to choose with bean soup and salad.
My go to place when I want my fried chicken....love every thing about this place
When I went they didn't have Lechon! But no frills with good food and service.
The food is great. La mejor comida buen sabor.
Their fried chicken,chicken ziti,fried shrimps fish, everything is too good.... must try
